mdRecord.dcterms:description: First row (l to r): Harold Lee Riley III, Frederic Aroyce Berry, Jr., Antonina Lidija Skapars, Inta Ilse Janners Ertel, Garry Arnold Goldstein, James Douglas Deacon, Mervyn Robert King, William Edward Daley, Leo Darrell Lagasse, Wilson Baxter Rumble, Abraham Isaac Sobel, Samir Mustafa Khalidy, John William Bolen, Russell Austin Enke, Kenneth Robert McIntire. Second row (l to r): Rosa Christiane Ogle, Charles Edwin Hess, Martha Alma Carpenter, Paul Yount Ertel, John Gusdon, Jr., Bertram Lee Warren, Alan Edward Siegal, Julian Dantzler Kelly, Frederick Bruce Forward, John Wise Wescott, Robert Nelson Page, Jr., John Peyton Snead IV, Carter Snow Bagley, William Robert Wiseman. Third row (l to r): Bernard Fruchtman, Stanton Peelle Nolan, William Markley McKinney, Niles Person Severin, Rudi Ansbacher, Richard Joseph Duma, George Henry Guy, Mitchel Joe Dreese, Charles Little Echols, David Stewart Summers, Albert Ayerst Carr, David Elijah Robinette, William Ford McKee, Jr., Gary Richard Vart. Fourth rwo (l to r): George Edward Shissler, David Phlegar Olinger, William Blaine Kingree, Hadden Christopher Alexander, Joseph Raymond Barry Hutchinson, Jr., John Baggarly Myers, William Sams Tunner, Samuel Frederick Brunk, Charles Chapman Binford, Henry Steele Lewis, Jr., Waller Crockett Tabb, John David Fletcher, Roger Arthur Glover, Jr. Fifth row (l to r): John Mathews Pitma, Jr., Jack Everett Arrants, David Lawrence Sagman, Matthew James McDermott, Jr., Walter Merritt Moore III, Frank Joseph O'Connor, Jr., Vincent Taormina, Robert Henry Bowden, Jr., Douglas Kenley Armbrister, Roby Calvin Thompson, Jr., William Ford McKee, Jr., Laurence Lee Cockerille, Jr., Sheldon David Glass.
